resources.string: Shows when ADB connection is active
WiFi ADB connection is being maintained
Başka bir Android cihazda ADB komutlarını çalıştırmak için bir OTG kablosu ve USB hata ayıklamayı kullanın. Hedef cihazın geliştirici ayarlarından USB Hata Ayıklamayı açmanız gerekir.
Kablosuz hata ayıklama özelliğini kullanarak cihazları (Android 11+) Wi-Fi üzerinden bağlayın ve ADB komutlarını uzaktan çalıştırın.
Maksimum yer imi sınırına ulaşıldı! Yenilerini eklemek için bazı yer imlerini silin
Bu ekrandaki her şeyi temizlemek istediğinizden emin misiniz?
Open \"Wireless debugging\" on the target device and tap \"Pair device with pairing code\"
Uyarı! Bu işlem geri alınamaz\nTüm yer imlerini silmek istediğinizden emin misiniz?
The wireless debugging connection was lost. What would you like to do?
Are you sure you want to delete %1$d selected items?
Are you sure you want to delete \"%1$s\"?
Uygulama ayarlarını ve diğer verileri yedekleme ve geri yükleme
Backup app database which includes the command examples & bookmarks
Ask for confirmation before clearing the shell output
Kabuk çıktısını kaydetmek için bir dizin seçin
View all crashes that have occurred in the app
Harici bir klavye kullanmak istediğinizde kullanışlıdır
Uygulama temasını cihaz duvar kağıdına göre otomatik olarak ayarlar
Açıldığında, güncellemeler doğrudan uygulama içinden Github\'dan indirilecektir. Kapatarak, manuel indirme için Github sürümleri sayfasını ziyaret edebilirsiniz.
Aklınızda herhangi bir fikir veya öneri varsa, bize bildirin
Dokunmatik geri bildirim için etkileşimli dokunsal geri bildirimler
OLED ekranlar için zifiri karanlık modu
Sadece uygulamaları ve tasarımı seven bir adam
Bu uygulamanın kullandığı lisans hakkında bilgi edinin
Çok sayıda yer imi eklenirse gecikmeye neden olabilir! Düşük donanımlı cihazlar bu seçeneği kapalı tutmalıdır
Uygulamayı kullanırken karşılaştığınız herhangi bir sorunu bildirin
Kaydedilen yedekleme dosyasından uygulama verilerini geri yükleyin.\nKaydedilen veritabanı mevcut veritabanının üzerine yazacaktır.
Enable this option to save output of the whole shell session.\nIf disabled only the last command output will be saved.
Üst veya alt oka tıklandığında kabuk çıktısında akıcı kaydırmayı etkinleştirir
The WiFi ADB connection was lost.
Running ADB commands can modify system settings, manage files, and perform operations that may affect your device’s stability.\nYou are solely responsible for any changes made using this app.
While root access is not mandatory, certain commands may require elevated permissions.\nMisuse of ADB commands can lead to data loss, app crashes, or unexpected system behavior.
Root Zorunlu Değil, Ancak Dikkat Gerekli

The developer(s) of this app are not responsible for any damage, data loss, or unintended consequences resulting from the use of this app.\nProceed with caution and ensure you understand the commands you execute.
This app is designed for users who have a basic understanding of ADB commands.\nIf you are unsure about a command’s effect, research it before executing it.
This app may require special permissions to function properly.\nIt does not collect or share personal data, but users should be aware of the implications of granting ADB-related permissions.
Please enable Wireless Debugging in Developer Options
Failed to open USB connection. Is USB debugging enabled?
File transfers not supported in OTG mode
A folder with this name already exists
Are you sure you want to forget %1$s? You will need to pair again to connect.
Execute ADB commands directly on your device using Shizuku or root.
Komutları çalıştırmak için root erişimini kullanın. Root gerektiren komutlar çalıştırılabilir.
Komutları çalıştırmak için Shizuku\'yu kullanın. Root gerektiren komutlar çalışmaz.
No ADB-compatible devices found. Enable USB debugging on the target.
Bu sürüm için değişiklik günlüğü bulunamadı.
No crashes have been reported. aShell You is running smoothly.
No files selected (folders cannot be downloaded)
Eşleştirme işlemini tamamlamak için aShell You\'dan gelen bir bildirimle etkileşime geçmeniz gerekecektir. Lütfen aShell You\'ya bildirim erişimine izin verin.

Bildirimden Eşleştirme Kodunu giremiyorsanız, Bildirim Gölgesini Android olarak değiştirmeniz gerekebilir. Bildirim Stilini değiştirmek için Bildirim Ayarları ~ Bildirim Stili\'ne gidin. Aksi takdirde bildirimden eşleştirme kodunu giremeyebilirsiniz.
Maksimum yer imi sınırını geçersiz kıl

Could not connect to the paired device
The device may not be on the same network
Try pairing again
Pair a device using QR or pairing code to see it here
Eşleştirmeye yardımcı olması için aShell You\'dan bir bildirim alacaksınız
Please pick a file with .ashellyou extension

These versions are still in testing and may contain unfinished features or unexpected bugs. If you choose to update to a pre-release, please be aware that things might break or behave strangely.\nIf you encounter any issues, crashes, or weird behavior, please report them so we can fix and improve aShellYou before the stable release.\nThanks for helping us build better!
To pair an Android 11+ device, scan this QR from the target device
QR scanner available at:\nDeveloper Options > Wireless Debugging > Pair using QR Code
\nWireless Debugging might not be enabled\nPairing info might be lost. Pair manually again!
Kaydedilen dosyadaki veriler mevcut verilerin yerine geçecektir.
Enter the 6-digit code from the pairing dialog
Please wait while connecting to this device
Open Wireless Debugging and tap \'Pair device with pairing code\'
Local ADB shell is now available
Timeout - open pairing dialog in Wireless Debugging
Wrong code - open pairing dialog again
The output of last command is exported to \'%s\'
The shell output is exported to \'%s\'
Shizuku cihazınızda yüklü değil veya doğru şekilde yapılandırılmamış
Device is connected successfully. You can now start running commands on the target device.
Uygulamayı beğendin mi? \nO zaman bir kahve ısmarlarsın :)
Refresh wireless debugging connection by toggling it off-on
Wi-Fi bağlantısında İNTERNET YOKSA Mobil Veriyi kapatın
İzin verilmedi. Lütfen bilinmeyen kaynaklardan uygulama yüklemesine izin verin.
Click on the download button to get the latest version of aShellYou from the github repository.
What would you like to do while %1$s?
Which device would you like to pair?
Kablosuz Hata Ayıklama özelliğini kullanmak için cihazınızın bir Wi-Fi ağına bağlı olması gerekir. Wi-Fi bağlantınızda internet erişimi yoksa, sağlam bir Wi-Fi bağlantısı için mobil veriyi kapatın.
Geliştirici seçenekleri > Kablosuz Hata Ayıklama\'ya gidin. Eşleştirme Kodu ile cihazı eşleştir\'e dokunun.
Altı haneli Eşleştirme Kodunu, aShell You tarafından gönderilen bildirime girin.
Uygulamaya geri dönün ve ana ekrandaki \"Başlat\" düğmesine tıklayın.
Lütfen Kablosuz Hata Ayıklama seçeneğinin sol kısmının tıklanabilir olduğunu unutmayın. Üzerine dokunmak Kablosuz Hata Ayıklama Eşleştirme menüsünü açacaktır.

Whole UI Revamped, using material expressive components
Rewritten whole codebase in Kotlin and Jetpack Compose as UI Framework
Added push & pull based file manager
Added QR Wifi Adb Pairing mode
Added app settings and database backup options
Added custom theming options
Added crash history to view app crash logs
Improved auto update feature
Improved UI & UX in shell output
Added Android permissions suggestions
Revamped command examples layout to include labels
Added option to Add, Edit or Delete commands as you wish
Lots of existing bugs are now fixed

Now command search can search the commands that contains the word you typed compared to previous versions where it only searched commands that starts with the typed word.
Option to open Shizuku app directly when Shizuku is installed but not running.
Fixed the broken in app crash reporter.
\nFixed the issue which caused per app translations to be broken for aShell You

Adapted Github Actions for release builds.
What this means for you?
All subsequent builds including this will be more secure!

Added WIRELESS DEBUGGING mode for running ADB commands on both own or other device
Redesigned homepage for minimal navigation and less cluttery input field screen
Added Warning feedback when executing commands involving critical system packages
Added in-app updater. Now you can directly download the latest package without visiting Github repository
Fixed a lot of bugs

Huge UI and UX improvements across all sections of the app
Added ROOT and BASIC shell in addition to Shizuku shell for running commands
Added option to save output in custom directory
Fixed a lot of bugs and issues
Optimised app's code for better performance and stability

Added vibration for haptic feedback
Added option to change app language from within the app (for devices running Android 13 and above only and excluding unsupported devices)
Fixed some crashes and improved crash reporting
Minor UI improvements
\nNow app catches any crashes and provides the option to report them via email

Added option to open saved output directly
Added option to save whole output or the last command output only
Fixed crashes
\nFixed an issue with Sharing text to aShell You where the text did not appear when app was starting fresh\nFixed minor UI issues

Stable release of OTG mode
Added features like save, share, quick scroll buttons to the OTG mode
Added info cards for quick information
Added in app update checker along with the option to auto check for updates
Minor UI improvements
\nFixed some issues in OTG adb support\nUpdated translations
\nFixed AMOLED theme not working on devices running Android 11 or below

Now you can Pin commands for quick access

Bug fixes and lot of code optimisations

Now you can directly use commands from the Commands section instead of the need to copy them every time

Added option to delete all bookmarks
In search : You can now search in commands summary by clicking a prompt chip
Added sorting options in Commands templates
Added option to directly bookmark selected items in Commands section
Chip Indicator shows connected device(currently only in local ADB mode)
Fixed bugs causing crashes in devices running Android 11 or below
Added Turkish translation
Minor UI improvements
Lot of other bug fixes

Added Search in commands section
Added option to set default working mode
Improved animations
Reworked bookmarks section and added sorting options
Increased bookmarks limit to 25
Removed ADB shell launcher shortcut and added Commands launcher shortcut
Fixed padding issues in button navigation
Fixed some buttons shape
\nApp uses a more refreshed color palette for material you theming\nFixed minor bugs
\nFixed some crashes that were introduced in v3.8.0

Added black (amoled) theme
Added undo button to undo paste
Added option to disable soft keyboard
Fixed buttons stretched in some screen sizes
Fixed bookmarks button not appearing after opening the app
Renamed Examples section to Commands
Fixed copy command option not appearing for every command template
App now uses system font everywhere
Improved UI handling
Updated translations

Now you can share texts from anywhere on your device to aShell You and run commands directly.
Now you can share shell output directly without needing to save it !
A lot of optimisations and UI handling.
Added Chinese translations.
Updated translations.

Added option to clear the command input field after an error
Fixed a bug which caused the app to crash upon pasting from clipboard under certain conditions
Code optimisations

Revamped About section of the app.
Added launcher shortcuts.
Fixed navigation menu not showing in button navigation.
Improved bottom navigation menu visibility on scrolling.
Added per app language support for aShell You (translations aren't completed yet).
A lot of code optimisations.

Added a Paste button so that you can copy and paste commands quickly.
Added Error indicators in the text input field.
Improved Navigation Bar visibility logic.
Fixed an issue where switches misbehaves under certain situations.
Fixed add bookmark icon visibility in various contrast levels.
A lot of code optimisation. App now opens a lot faster than before.
App will stay in background and won't restart every time you close the app by just pressing the back button or gesture.

Added bookmarks , history and command suggestions to OTG
Added maximum bookmarks limit.
Added option to override maximum bookmarks limit.
A lot of bug fixes.
Improved some UI handling.
A lot of code optimisation.

A lot of UI related improvements.
Added chips that indicate current ADB working mode.
A lot of code optimisation.
\nImprovements to ADB OTG after initial release.\nSome UI and logic adjustments to accomodate the new otg feature.

Added ADB THROUGH OTG support.

*** You will be able to run ADB commands on other devices using aShellYou by connecting the other device using an OTG cable ***
\nRemoved unnecessary code and resources.\nMinor UI changes.
\nRemoved unnecessary code and resources.\nMinor UI changes.

Changed app name to aShell You.
Added predictive back animations for supporting devices.
Added confirmation dialog popup before clearing screen.
Fixed StatusBar elements not properly visible in Light mode.
App is much more smooth now.
~ Reduced app size and optimised code.
Added themed icon for launchers that support themed icons.
Minor UI changes.

Revamped Settings panel.
Added Double Tap to instant scroll to top and bottom positions in shell output view.
Minor UI fixes.

Added Settings panel.
Added option to disable smooth scroll in shell output.
Fixed major bugs:

 ~ Crash while changing device theme.

 ~ Crash while trying to save large shell output . eg : output of 'pm' command.

Added Scroll To Top and Scroll To Bottom buttons.
Added Click keyboard Enter key to Send command.
Added some commands.
Updated dependencies to include latest material you library.
Minor UI changes.

Added some more command examples.
Minor UI changes.
Changed package name to avoid version confusion with original app.

Added changelogs into the app.
Added highlighted shell output.
Minor UI changes.
\nAdded dynamic material theming.\nRevamped whole UI to give a fresh look.
